ComicInfo.Summary: Did you ever want to change everything about you? Quinn is the perfect subject: unhappy with their body's limitations, addicted to prosthetics. They would do anything to become perfect...and Doctor Torossian, head of Trabeal's Project CHANGELING, is about to oblige. So, get ready for a bloody tale of sci-fi-themed carnage and cybernetically assisted psychosis, in full living color! This incredible story is about to open up into a whole new world when the long-lost hero Agent '79 is called out of retirement to try to stop Quinn's rampage. It's old school vs new school when an obsolete relic has to stop a cutting-edge nightmare! "Parts" was originally serialized in American Mythology Monsters. This issue is fully colored for the first time and includes a brand-new chapter!
